alert.note: Alert for Saratoga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central New York, including the following county, Saratoga. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Saratoga Springs, Milton, North Ballston Spa, Kings, Wilton, Greenfield, Kings Station, Saratoga Race Course, Yaddo, Greenfield Center, Eddy Corners, Saratoga Performing Arts Center, Travers Corners, Gilbert Corners, South Greenfield, Barnes Corners, North Greenfield, Hickeys Corners, Gurn Spring and Randall Corner. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
